article_title: New Philadelphia City Schools treasurer receives award

article_metadata.description: New Philadelphia City Schools Treasurer Julie Erwin recently received the Rich Unger Pinnacle Award at the Ohio Association of School Business Officials’ 60th annual workshop and trade show in Columbus.The award recognizes school business officials who demonstrate exemplary professionalism and contribution of an innovative school business procedure or program to their school district. Erwin earned the award for creating several worksheets and technology applications for accumulating

og.description: New Philadelphia City Schools Treasurer Julie Erwin recently received the Rich Unger Pinnacle Award at the Ohio Association of School Business
